opener.dateline:
431 Stevens st.Street
cor West.
Camden,
N.New Jersey Jan.January 11.

body.p: Card came this morning. Letter you speak of must have been destroyed, as I have rec'dreceived none—Rec'dReceived letter from P[eter] D[oyle] this morning. Am still getting along favorably considering all things—Heard from J[ohn] B[urroughs] last week—all well. Had a letter from Dr. Drinkard—
